- name: Ensure new users receive home directories block:
- name: Check for duplicate values lineinfile: path: /etc/login.defs create: false regexp: ^\s*CREATE_HOME\s+ state: absent check_mode: true changed_when: false register: dupes
- name: Deduplicate values from /etc/login.defs lineinfile: path: /etc/login.defs create: false regexp: ^\s*CREATE_HOME\s+ state: absent when: dupes.found is defined and dupes.found > 1

- name: Declare missing syscalls set_fact: missing_syscalls="{{ syscalls | difference(syscalls_found) }}"
